The '''Mojang Studios Cape''' is a [[cape]] given to employees of [[Mojang Studios]].

== Appearance ==
The cape's design reflects the logo change that came with the rebrand from Mojang to Mojang Studios. It features some of the white "mojangs" that make up their logo against a red backdrop.<ref>https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/meet-mojang-studios</ref>

The cape was designed by [[Johan Aronson]].<ref>{{tweet|Mojang_Ined|1419622677644464130|Yep! Our talented art crew @JohanAronson & co designed the new Mojang Studios cape when we rebranded. We got around adding it together with the Migrator cape :)|July 26, 2021}}</ref>

== Distribution ==
This cape is given to those employed by Mojang Studios on or after July 25, 2021.
